main event: On July 10, 1957, a disc-like UFO was observed standing still in the sky approximately 8 miles northwest of Del Rio, Texas for 45 minutes before disappearing over the horizon.
interesting points: The pulsating light appeared to be stationary and was observed over the span of several nights.
No sound or feeling of movement was reported during the sighting.
The object changed course several times at irregular intervals, possibly indicating unusual maneuvers.
The report suggests that the object could have been an aircraft performing unusual maneuvers, either intelligently or unintelligently.
The sighting occurred under clear sky conditions with moonlight and starlight.
location: 8 miles NW of Del Rio, Texas
